translations.translation: hearts that Day will be pounding
Hearts will pound loudly on that day,
On that Day some hearts shall tremble (with fright),
hearts will undergo terrible trembling,
Many a heart will flutter on that day!
Hearts that Day will tremble.
Hearts on that day shall palpitate,
hearts upon that day shall be athrob
On that day hearts beat painfully
hearts will be throbbing,
Hearts on that Day will be throbbing;
hearts will be trembling on that day,
Hearts that Day will be in agitation;
(Some) hearts that Day will shake with fear and anxiety.
hearts will throb on that Day
Hearts on that Day will be pounding.
Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
[79:8] on that day hearts will be trembling, frightened and anxious,
726 (On that day) which is the Day of Judgement (hearts beat painfully) the hearts are fearful

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ } معناه خَائفةٌ { أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ } أي مُتواضعةٌ ذَليلةٌ

translations.translation: The saying of the Most High: { hearts on that day will be pounding } means afraid { their eyes will be lowered } meaning submissive and lowly

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ومن شدة الهول ونهاية الفزع { قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ } [النازعات: 8] قلقة حائرة
 شديدة الاضطراب

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ قلوبٌ يومئذٍ } 
 وهي قلوب منكري البعث
 { واجفةٌ } مضطربة
 من: الوجيف
 وهو الاضطراب
